solution_line_template: Raine takes {steps_one_way} x {trips_per_day} = <<{steps_one_way}*{trips_per_day}={steps_per_day}>>{steps_per_day} steps walking to and from school each day.
Thus, it takes her {steps_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{steps_per_day}*{num_days}={total_steps}>>{total_steps} steps in five days.
